argumentText:
ARGUMENT
k

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lfladd0l.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lfladd0l.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lfladd0l.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | lfladd0l.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 5 |  | lfladd0l.f | |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) |
| 6 |  | lfladd0l.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 7 |  | lfladd0l.g | |- ( ph -> G e. F ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` W ) e. _V |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_eqeltri | |- V e. _V |
| 10 | 9 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> V e. _V ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 12 | 2, 11, 1, 5 | #P_lflf | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ G e. F ) -> G : V --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 7, 12 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> G : V --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` R ) e. _V |
| 15 | 4, 14 | #P_eqeltri | |- .0. e. _V |
| 16 | 15 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> .0. e. _V ) |
| 17 | 2 | #P_lmodring | |- ( W e. LMod -> R e. Ring ) |
| 18 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. Grp ) |
| 19 | 6, 17, 18 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> R e. Grp ) |
| 20 | 11, 3, 4 | #P_grplid | |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ k e. ( Base ` R ) ) -> ( .0. .+ k ) = k ) |
| 21 | 19, 20 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( Base ` R ) ) -> ( .0. .+ k ) = k ) |
| 22 | 10, 13, 16, 21 | #P_caofid0l | |- ( ph -> ( ( V X. { .0. } ) oF .+ G ) = G ) |
